title: Lil' Devil Teemo and Bewitching Trist Splash

replies.body: When she sacrifices thousands of minions to summon you from 666th circle of hell. #relationshipgoals
I like this comment
Same, I always liked Teemo X Trist more than Rumble X Trist (come at me) since they have more in common

>
> When she sacrifices thousands of minions to summon you from 666th circle of hell. #relationshipgoals

but Hell only has 9 circles...

Well, I go by Rito's lore

>eldritch fuzz demons from the 666th circle of hell
http://imgur.com/aUeGsbi
Ok that's brilliant
But Graves doesn't have a cigar.
it's doom not league he can smoke if he wants.
_Shhh_
{{champion:68}} *stares angrily at people shipping these two with his trusty flamethrower at the ready*
You can't burn the devil
How about a water cannon then?
Water is evaporated that far underground
rocks?
Rocks are melted that far underground.

Spear made out of true ice


http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Freljord
The ice will lock up your spear/harpoon launcher

True Ice never melt

^ League Of Legends lore.
Can you shock him?
well it was actually Riot that started shipping them
not really trist just sorta friend zoned them all...
yeah Rumble, but not Teemo

"Teemo is a good friend"

It said something like that in his lore as a quote by her back in the day, implying that they are friends and nothing more.
I think you should read a little further :)
I think you are reading too far into it (she really deserves better anyway)

You could have atleast informed yourself before writing these posts. 
(What should be better?)

I am informed - she views teemo as a friend, as evidenced in his (old) lore.  There is nothing written in lore that provides any evidence otherwise.  Rumble, it is true, is implied to have a crush on Trist (mech name, super galaxy interactions).  Teemo has nothing written in the lore about his feelings for her (aside from saying in her old lore that there is no one he'd rather take on a difficult mission).  Thus there is nothing in the lore (and therefore the game) to support your position.

Seriously, may you look up their lore for once? 
I think you're having a severe case of "I only see what I want to see"

I have read their lore.  I think you have a case of "I see what I want to see" as well - there is nothing that describes their friendship in any other, more romantic terms.  If I am wrong, please point me to the exact lines.

> [...]Teemo recently struck up a friendship with Tristana[...] though now Valoran's voracious media outlets circulate rumors that the friendship is turning into a romantic relationship[...]

> [...]Tristana recently struck up a close friendship with Teemo, the Swift Scout[...] though she outright ignores any questions pertaining to a blossoming romance.

meaning, it's a 50/50 chance that they are in a relationship. 
Of course the lore is a bit old, but as long as we don't have it updated, 
I can only refer to this source.

>Doom Bots
[Lots and lots of doombots related files]

>"The Teemoing has begun!"

> "Destroy Devil Teemo to stop The Teemoing!"

Im more intrested in this part of the S@20
Looks like it's coming in time for the Harrowing :D

Tch. Fire and brimstone? How uninspired. 

The difference between Teemo and Veigar is Veigar makes evil look good.

Superb senpai! You've returned to us!
Sad to see Teemo's recall face isn't being used in the splash. #missedopportunity
A king can't be looking all crazy while upon his throne

I am the bone of my blowpipe. 
 Stealth is my body and poison is my blood. 
 I have created over a thousand mushrooms.
 Unknown to death,
 Nor known to life.
 Have withstood pain to create many traps. 
 Yet, those hands will never hold anything.
 My whole life was unlimited shrooms works.

Sooo....

Are these this years Halloween skins?

If so...cant help but be a little disappointed. I loved the zombie theme of last year's and was kinda hoping that would continue.  

Although....that Teemo skin looks very cool...
It would be kinda boring if they did the same theme every year though
Keep it fresh by different styles each year.

Riot really has pushed the envelope for Tristana's skins after she got her new model. Dragon Trainer was really good and this one looks like it could be fun as well. I hope other champs that got updates get this kind of love eventually, especially Trundle and Yorick.
I hope they put up Morg's splash soon. I like that model a lot more than the teaser made her look, I'm kinda psyched about that skin.
